name: Trial By Nightfall
description:
Run and gun in this top-down action arcade shooter for up to two players. For your crimes of treason you are hereby sentenced to trial by nightfall. May the gods have mercy on you, for the creatures of the night will not. Spin your revolvers or draw back your bow because the sun is setting and nobody makes it back alive on nights like these.

Made for the #NoticeMe Game Jam.
